sentences.en: A bistable storage device which stores binary data as states of flip - flop elements.
sentences.cn: 一种以触发器的状态存储二进制数据的双稳态存储器.

sentences.en: A byte composed of three binary element.
sentences.cn: 一种由三个二进制位组成的字节.

sentences.en: A set of specified binary codes used to check the correctness of digital circuits.
sentences.cn: 一组用于检测数字电路正确性的特定二进制码.

sentences.en: Addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division are binary operations.
sentences.cn: 加 、 减 、 乘 、 除都是二元运算.

sentences.en: Binary data that requires two or more bytes for full representation.
sentences.cn: 需要两个或多个字节来完整表示的二进制数据.
计算机运行运用二进位制.

sentences.en: It would, however , be very tedious and difficult to write all information in binary code.
sentences.cn: 把所有的信息都翻译成二进制码是十分枯燥和困难的.

sentences.en: Let us try converting the number itself to binary.
sentences.cn: 我们试一试,把这个数本身变成二进制数.

sentences.en: Number of binary code recording on magnetic tape per unit length.
sentences.cn: 单位长度的磁带上所记录的二进制代码数.

sentences.en: The binary system of numbers is used in digital computers.
sentences.cn: 数字计算机都使用二进制数字系统.

sentences.en: The horizontal and vertical ticks ( 3 ) are a representation of the number 8 in binary form.
sentences.cn: 水平和垂直线所标记 ( 3 ) 是以二进位制表示的数目8.

sentences.en: The radix complement in the pure binary numeration system.
sentences.cn: 纯二进制记数系统中的基数补码.

sentences.en: There are various ways of obtaining the powers and roots of binary numbers.
sentences.cn: 求二进制数的乘方和开方的方法有多种.

sentences.en: Using binary notation is in fact just manipulating ones and noughts.
sentences.cn: 使用二进制标号法实际上只运用1和0两个数.

words.tran_cn: [数]二进制的；二元的，[电子]二态的

phrases.tran_cn: 二进制数据；二进数据；二元数据
二段体；二元形式；二元型；二段曲式
二元逻辑；二进制逻辑；二进位逻辑运算
二元对立；二项对立；相对关系
二进制表示法；二进位表示；二元表示
对分查找；二进位检索；折半查找法；二分搜寻
[数]二叉树；[计]二进制树形网络

trans.tran_cn: 双重的，由两个东西组成的，二态的，二元的，二进制的
trans.tran_en: a system of counting, used in computers, in which only the numbers 0 and 1 are used
